error_message: MCP tools (PostHog and Neon) are not directly accessible in this execution context. The agent requires access to mcp_Posthog_query_run and mcp_Neon_run_sql to collect real-time user activity data.
workaround: In a production environment, this agent would invoke MCP tools via the Claude Desktop integration to query PostHog analytics and Neon database directly.
steps_attempted: Attempted to invoke user-activity-tracker skill - skill invocation not available in current context
Looked for alternative data collection methods

recommendation: This scheduled task demonstrates the workflow structure. For full functionality, ensure the agent has access to MCP servers configured in Claude Desktop.
